title: 2019 MLB playoff schedule: Dates, TV channels for postseason, World Series
text:
CLOSE

After a grueling 162 games and six months, Major League Baseball's postseason is finally underway.

The reigning champion Boston Red Sox missed out on the playoffs this year, meaning we'll have a new World Series winner in 2019.

Things kicked off Oct. 1 when the Nationals rallied to stun the Brewers 4-3 in the National League wild-card game. In the junior circuit, the Rays slugged four homers to beat the Athletics 5-1 on Oct. 2.

The best-of-five Division Series starts Thursday in the National League followed by the American League on Friday. The winners of each division series then meet in the best-of-seven League Championship Series.

After that, it's the Fall Classic.

Who's going to become a hero this October?

2019 MLB playoff bracket (Photo: USA TODAY Sports)
